game.name: Flappy Witch
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A witch soars into the night to save her beloved cat… but dark magic always comes with a price.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A witch soars into the night to save her beloved cat… but dark magic always comes with a price.
